âœ… Correct: D. All three statements are false.
Why the false statements are false:
- (1) A registration statement (e.g., S-1) is filed before the offering; it is required for registered public offerings.
- (2) A preliminary prospectus typically excludes the final offer price and final share count; those are set at pricing.
- (3) The final prospectus includes the final offer terms (including the offer price) and is finalized after pricing.
